name: Choro is my Boi

Idk man. I dont know what to put down here :(((

jk, okay soooo-

This game is just about you being with Choro and shit. You can customize the name of the main character too. Enjoy I guess-

[(Y/n) is supposed to be you BTW-]

(BTW, Oso, Kara, Choro, Ichi, Jyushi and Todo aren't my characters. They were supposed to be the Matsuno sextuplets but I grew lazy for typing in the matsu : ''  )

(Also pls note that this is an Osomatsu-san game ;-:)
